ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Recent changes to pets
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, if there was a pc/npc code change then is charm refreshable? Probably not but I m not home to check. Ninev Rudeflute E ci Nice to see ya again Galtin :)
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, if there was a pc/npc code change then is charm refreshable?
Probably not but I'm not home to check.

Ninev Rudeflute
E'ci

Nice to see ya again Galtin :)
Getting lost in CC sucked, by the time you said there was a back out I
was already stuck somewhere far far away.


--- Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...> wrote:
> Now that pets are treated as PCs instead of NPCs when it comes to
> procing,

-el sniparoonie-

> Galtin of E'ci
